summary: A Catholic and a Protestant couple in Northern Ireland have amazing parallels in their lives, despite being either side of the divide.
cast: Brid Brennan|Des McAleer|Paula Hamilton|Charles Lawson|B.J. Hogg|Adrian Gordon|Shane Connaughton|Eileen Pollock|Stephen Rea|David Coyle|John Keegan|John Hewitt|Ann Hasson|Geraldine Lidster|Stephen Lidster|Lisa Mullan|Kerry O'Neill|Emma Hamilton|Mark Lawless
title: Four Days in July
